snippet.title: Mega-CD Longplay [075] Fahrenheit
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played By:- /Y\ad/Y\atty

A complete playthrough on Hard difficulty.  Full ending and all Bonus items.  The video could have been about 30 mins shorter had I ignored the bonus objectives and sadly their isn't any reward for finding them all :/

Level 3 went on abit to long as I went the wrong way around the map so I saw Operation room and service room in wrong order and had to go round again at the end.  Thankfully the game manual contains the level maps else id never have gotten through the huge maze.

Some notes regarding Hard mode  from the Manual :-
Level 1: - 00:00 - House - 3 Bonus Items - No Extra O2 from finding Hazards
Level 2: - 09:25 - Hotel - 12 Bonus Items - 4 Floors instead of  2 easy, 3 normal
Level 3: - 31:33 - University - 12 Bonus Items - Huge Maze -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
